mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (post_id, user_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, f.id AS author_id, f.name AS author_name, f.phone AS author_phone, f.region AS author_region FROM comments c LEFT JOIN farmers f ON c.user_id = f.id ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT c.*, f.id AS author_id, f.name AS author_name, f.phone AS author_phone, f.region AS author_region FROM comments c LEFT JOIN farmers f ON c.user_id = f.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
